thread.title: You'll Never Guess What Britney Spears Does in the Middle of the Night to Stay in Shape
thread.title_full: You'll Never Guess What Britney Spears Does in the Middle of the Night to Stay in Shape

author: Kelsey Glein
title: You'll Never Guess What Britney Spears Does in the Middle of the Night to Stay in Shape
text:
by: Kelsey Glein 
Talk about dedication. 
Britney Spears took to Instagram today to prove once again that she is very zealous about working on her fitness. And apparently, her devotion to having rock-hard abs includes doing handstands in the middle of the night. The "Slumber Party" singer posted a video on social media that shows her walking on her hands around her house at a time when most people would be asleep, wearing nothing but a printed sports bra and cutoff denim shorts. 
" What do you do in the wee hours of the night?... walk on your hands," the 35-year-old star wrote alongside the clip. A video posted by Britney Spears (@britneyspears) on Feb 3, 2017 at 2:06pm PST 
VIDEO: 10 of Britney Spears's Hottest Bikini Photos 

Spears has shared plenty of photos in the past that feature her getting her exercise on at the gym. Just a few weeks ago she 'grammed a video that shows her lifting weights while her toned midsection is on full display.
